mapper.insert: insert into review_attach (uuid, uploadpath, filename, filetype, re_att_num) values (#{uuid}, #{uploadPath}, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, seq_re_att.nextval )
mapper.update: update review_attach set review_num=#{review_num} where uuid=#{uuid}
mapper.select: select * from review_attach where uploadpath = to_char(sysdate -1 ,'yyyy\mm\dd')
